settings.title: Get Maximum Relief For Diabetic Varicose Veins & Edema
settings.text:
• Specially designed to combat diabetic varicose veins & edema
  • 12-15 mmHg graduated compression optimizes blood flow
  • All-day energy even if you stand or sit for long periods of time

settings.heading: Tired of Heavy, Achy Legs & Feet?

settings.caption: Varicose veins and edema can look and feel awful – esepcially after a long day sitting or standing at work. Luckily with Viasox, you can finally get support for your:

settings.text:
Swollen, achy legs and feet

Heavy legs and feet

Poor blood flow circulation

Twisted, bulging veins

Stretchy, shiny skin from edema

settings.title: Tired of Heavy, Achy Legs & Feet?
14 Days Money Back
settings.text: Not 100% satisfied? We got you covered.

settings.text:

The fanciest socks on the market
so you can look at your legs & feet and smile

infections, reduces odors and keep feet dry

rubbing and more

settings.title: Who Said Comfort Can't Be Stylish?

settings.heading: How Can Diabetic Compression Socks Help With With My Varicose Veins or Edema?

settings.caption: Poor blood flow circulation in your legs causes blood to pool which results in the swelling of the legs and feet. Viasox Compression Socks reverse this effect by applying mild yet comfortable pressure on your legs pushing blood back up to your heart. This reduces painful swelling, and improves the energy in your legs throughout the day!

settings.name: Kathryn L.
settings.title: The Best Buy you’ll ever make!
settings.text: Absolutely love these Soxs!! When I ordered them I was hesitant, you know the feeling, they had to be “to good to be true “”. We’ll you know what, they are the most amazing things I’ve ever had on my feet!! I bought 1 or of compression and 2 regular with a pair of mystery Sox’s added in. I have lg calves and deems in one foot. The best way to describe them is they feel as good as your favourite sweater/jumper/pullover hugging your curves!! They are in 2 words “freaking awesome!” Can’t wait to buy more!!

settings.name: Jenny M.
settings.title: Great socks for Mom
settings.text: I bought these for my mother who is going to be 98 years old and living in a care facility. She is still quite active but swollen legs is a problem. She loved the cat and dog prints and although at first the socks were a challenge to get on I think they will help her and when the swelling gets better they’ll be easier to get on. They really are the only socks that actually will work for her. Thank you!

settings.heading: What Do Viasox Diabetic Compression Socks Do?
settings.text: When you have poor blood flow circulation in your legs and feet, blood tends to pool up in these areas and cause swelling. Viasox Compression Socks combat this effect by applying mild yet comfortable pressure on your legs and pushing blood back up to your heart. When you wear our socks, you'll get the right amount of circulation support so you can get the comfort and energy you deserve.

settings.heading: What's The Difference Between Viasox Diabetic Compression Socks And Other Brands?
settings.text: For best results, we recommend wearing your Viasox Compression Socks before you get out of bed until you’re ready to go back. That means you can wear our socks all day and finally get the unmatched energy your legs have been waiting for.

settings.heading: How Long Should I Wear Them For?
settings.text: For best results, we recommend wearing your Viasox Non-Binding Diabetic Socks during the day and taking them off before you sleep.

settings.heading: How often should I wash my Viasox Compression Diabetic Socks?
settings.text: While Viasox are infused with an antimicrobial material, washing your garment is still required. For optimal results, washing after every use is recommended.

settings.heading: Who can benefit from wearing Viasox Compression Diabetic Socks?
settings.text: Viasox Compression Diabetic Socks are perfect for anyone who sits or stands for long periods of time at their job or experience varicose veins or edema.

settings.heading: When Will I Receive My Package?
settings.text: All orders take 1-3 business days to process after your order is placed. Thereafter, packages will take 4-8 business days to reach you. Your confirmation email received upon ordering will enclose your package’s ETA. Please note, the ETA is an estimate and does not account for weekends or holidays. There are no shipment notification emails sent.

settings.heading: What Payment-Types Do We Accept?
settings.text: We currently accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Debit Visas and PayPal.To set up with PayPal – please Email us at support@viasox.com

settings.heading: Does Viasox Do Returns?
settings.text: All Viasox sales are final and non-refundable. We're sorry we're unable to accept returns due to the nature of our product. When you send back the item to us, we're unable to send them to other customers.

settings.heading: What If I Received The Wrong Size/Pattern Than What I Ordered?
settings.text: If you have received something other than what you were expecting, please email us atsupport@viasox.comwithin five days of receiving your socks. You will be asked to provide us with a photo of the item that you received for verification. If you do contact us after the five-day period, we may not be able to assist you with any concerns regarding your items.

settings.heading: What If I Received Something Damaged?
settings.text: If you have received something other than what you were expecting, please email us atsupport@viasox.comwithin five days of receiving your order. Please make sure it's in the same condition as received and in its original packaging. As your order may not be eligible for a replacement if it has been washed, has visible wear or damage, and is not in the original packaging, including outer sleeves and tags. If you do contact us after the five-day period, we may not be able to assist you with any concerns regarding your items.
